title: How can I install a CA Certificate on Pixel
content:
I want to install a CA certificate for server authentication on my phone. I know I can trust the server since I created the certificate myself.
I try Install a certificate\ CA Certificate

For crt file I get: "Private key required to install certificate"
For a joined public private key p12 file I get: "This file can'T be used as a CA certificate" but without any additional information and also it doesn'T make sense to have to use a private key...

I tried googling this but there only seem to be very weird hacks etc..

As this it not a super fancy case I wonder how to do it ....
